messages.subject: hugs to Faith
messages.msgSnippet: I wanted to apologize if my last post seemed rude.  I didn t mean to be! As someone said, e-mail is challenging bc we don t see each others faces and hear our
messages.messageBody:
I wanted to apologize if my last post seemed rude. I didn't mean to be!
As someone said, e-mail is challenging bc we don't see each others faces
and hear our tones of voice. I too, am just sharing my view and hoping
to learn more along my own parenting journey.
We never know when we state our views if others will say "I agree" or "I
can't believe you think that way". But we would never learn anything new
if people didn't speak up when they don't agree with us.

I want to thank you, Faith, for sharing why you feel as you do. We make
the best decisions when we have carefully thought out reasons behind our
actions.

Mary Ellen
We are shut up in schools and college recitation rooms for ten or fifteen
years,
and come out at last with a bellyful of words and do not know a thing.
Ralph Waldo Emerson
